content.question: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Roosevelt makes to convey his message about the responsibilities that come with the United States’ growth in power and prosperity.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Roosevelt makes to convey his message about the responsibilities that come with the United States’ growth in power and prosperity.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
